org.quartz.utils

Class DBConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.quartz.utils.DBConnectionManager

  • public class DBConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Manages a collection of ConnectionProviders, and provides transparent access to their connections.

    Author:
    James House, Sharada Jambula, Mohammad Rezaei
    See Also:
    ConnectionProvider, PoolingConnectionProvider, JNDIConnectionProvider

        public void shutdown(java.lang.String dsName)
